import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete tags by query"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tags/query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Soft-deletes all tags matched by the legacy query parameters, removing them from standard tag lists while keeping records available for restore.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the target set via [GET /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-query).
2. Call [DELETE /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/delete-tags-by-query) with the same paging parameters to delete that slice of results.
3. Restore a specific tag later via [PUT /api/v1.0/tags/\{TagId\}/undelete](/docs/api/tags/undelete-tag).

**Minimal Required Fields**: none

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"$p","in":"query","description":"Page index (0-based)","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0}},{"name":"$s","in":"query","description":"Page size","schema":{"type":"integer","default":25}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
